DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Subchronic Dopamine D2 Receptor Blockade Antipsychotic Drugs Healthy Humans
DOC.criteria: Healthy men , without positive family history schizophrenia . 20 kg/m2 < BMI < 26 kg/m2 Age 2040 year Fasting plasma glucose < 6 mmo/L FPG > 6 mmol/L BMI > 26 kg/m2 Psychiatric disorder and/or use antipsychotic antidepressant drug present past . Any significant chronic disease Renal , hepatic endocrine disease Use medication know influence lipolysis and/or glucose metabolism Total cholesterol > 7mmol/L and/or triglyceride > 2 mmol/L Recent weight change attempt loose weight ( > 3 kg weight gain loss , within last 3 month ) Difficulties insert intravenous catheter Smoking ( current ) Severe claustrophobia ( ventilate hood ) Recent blood donation ( within last 2 month ) Recent participation research project ( within last 3 month ) , participation 2 project one year Extensive sporting activity ( 10 hour exercise per week )
